Review Text: Very informative. It was a good movie. I was with Melissa Gilbert in every situation that came up.  This is a movie everyone should see, including predators so they find out what they are in for. Didn't give 5 stars only because some situations I feel needed a little more details and finishing out some of them.  Just my own opinion others may think it is fine the way it is.

Review Text: So happy to have this in my DVD collection!  A great movie. This movie came out when I was a young girl and had forgotten just how wonderful it was and how it effected my life then, even at such a young age and now at this age, also. Reminding me in a strong way of how faith in God can grow and bring joy back into this old woman's heart.

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: And Now Tomorrow
Review Date: 2018/05/10
Store: Alan Ladd, Loretta Young, Susan Hayward  (Actor),     Irving Pichel  (Director)    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ["Alan Ladd, Loretta Young and Susan Hayward star in this powerful love story And Now Tomorrow about one woman's extraordinary struggle over adversity. Emily Blair (Young) seems to have it all: money, prestige and independence. However, when her sense of hearing fades, her only hope lies with the young and determined Dr. Marek Vance (Ladd). As they search for a cure to her condition, hope gives way to unexpected romance in this screenplay co-written by famed detective novelist Raymond Chandler and featuring stunning costumes by Edith Head."]

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sweet Dreams (DVD)
Review Date: 2018/07/24
Store: Ed Harris  (Actor),     Jessica Lange  (Actor),     Karel Reisz  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, HBO, All HBO Titles
Product Description: ['Sweet Dreams (DVD)', 'She was the first female solo artist to be elected to the Country Music Hall of Fame. Thirty-two years after her untimely death in a plane crash in Tennessee, Patsy Cline\'s "Greatest Hits" album sold over six million copies. Loved by her fans today as much - if not more-than she was at the height of her fame, the life, the loves and most of all the voice of Patsy Cline is legendary. SWEET DREAMS tells her story. Marrying the unique singing voice of Patsy Cline, with a powerhouse performance by Jessica Lange, director Karel Reisz creates an extraordinary portrait of the passionate, fun-loving, soft-spoken, loud-living life and times of one of country\'s - and one of popular music\'s greatest singing stars. Covering the years 1956through 1963, from her rise to fame and the top of the charts through TV talent shows and country bars; through her turbulent marriage to Charlie Dick and the demands of touring which would lead to the fatal plane crash, this remarkable story is one that will be treasured by fans old and new. A celebration of the talent we love, and the story of Patsy Cline.', ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.8

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Scandal At Scourie (1953)
Review Date: 2021/03/29
Store: Greer Garson  (Actor),     Walter Pidgeon  (Actor),     Jean Negulesco  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Warner Home Video, All Titles
Product Description: ["Legendary Hollywood screen pair Greer Garson and Walter Pidgeon team for the ninth and last time in Scandal at Scourie, a heart-tugging Technicolor drama that has the duo facing obstacles with the kind of unbreakable love that saw them through aerial bombardments in Mrs. Miniver or the challenges of the medical unknown in Madame Curie. Set in Ontario, Canada, the story centers on Victoria and Patrick McChesney, whose decision to adopt an orphaned Catholic girl ignites controversy in their Protestant community. Patrick is accused of using the adoption to appeal to Catholic voeters and advance his political career. Victoria contends with self-righteous whispers about the child's out-of-wedlock birth. And an event in the child's past leads to a fear-mongering change that she is a pyromaniac. Passions and accusations rage. But like a ship plying stormy seas, the McChesney' love for each other and their child will prevail."]
Average Rating: 4.8

KnopfLinda Greer, Jean Negulesco, Agnes Moorehead, Walter Pidgeon, Archer MacDonald, Al Ferguson, Maudie Prickett, Eugene Bordon, Donna Corcoran, Patricia Tiernan, Nolan Leary, Margalo Gillmore, John Lupton, Robert Ross, Warren Farlow, George Davis, Max Willenz, Pe…   See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'B00KWP6JOY', 'Director': 'Jean Negulesco', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Release date': 'June 13, 2014', 'Actors': 'Greer Garson, Walter Pidgeon, Agnes Moorehead, Donna Corcoran, Arthur Shields', 'Producers': 'Edwin H. Knopf', 'Studio': 'Warner Archive Collection', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: A good movie with lots of empathy and comfort for the little girl who had been orphaned and in search of a family/  Greer Garson was terrific in this.  Walter Pidgeon was so good, also. My favorite kind of movie, probably because I felt lost and alone most of my childhood due to unkindness in a foster home.  Grew to get to know God as Father, which saved me. Finding out how much He loved me made the greatest difference in my life.
Review Title: People sacrificing to show the love of God.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Store: Richard Thomas  (Actor),     Catherine Burns  (Actor),     James Goldstone  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Drama
Product Description: ["An adolescent boy and his mother are sent to live in New Mexico after his father goes off to fight World War II. The move is hard on both mother and son. The boy, one of the few whites in the area, must deal with making friends, the strange new land, and first love. Meanwhile, his mother becomes increasingly withdrawn. When they learn that his father has been killed, the son must fight with his mother's lover to become the real head of the household."]

['Sweet Dreams (DVD)', 'She was the first female solo artist to be elected to the Country Music Hall of Fame. Thirty-two years after her untimely death in a plane crash in Tennessee, Patsy Cline\'s "Greatest Hits" album sold over six million copies. Loved by her fans today as much - if not more-than she was at the height of her fame, the life, the loves and most of all the voice of Patsy Cline is legendary. SWEET DREAMS tells her story. Marrying the unique singing voice of Patsy Cline, with a powerhouse performance by Jessica Lange, director Karel Reisz creates an extraordinary portrait of the passionate, fun-loving, soft-spoken, loud-living life and times of one of country\'s - and one of popular music\'s greatest singing stars. Covering the years 1956through 1963, from her rise to fame and the top of the charts through TV talent shows and country bars; through her turbulent marriage to Charlie Dick and the demands of touring which would lead to the fatal plane crash, this remarkable story is one that will be treasured by fans old and new. A celebration of the talent we love, and the story of Patsy Cline.', ']]>']

["Legendary Hollywood screen pair Greer Garson and Walter Pidgeon team for the ninth and last time in Scandal at Scourie, a heart-tugging Technicolor drama that has the duo facing obstacles with the kind of unbreakable love that saw them through aerial bombardments in Mrs. Miniver or the challenges of the medical unknown in Madame Curie. Set in Ontario, Canada, the story centers on Victoria and Patrick McChesney, whose decision to adopt an orphaned Catholic girl ignites controversy in their Protestant community. Patrick is accused of using the adoption to appeal to Catholic voeters and advance his political career. Victoria contends with self-righteous whispers about the child's out-of-wedlock birth. And an event in the child's past leads to a fear-mongering change that she is a pyromaniac. Passions and accusations rage. But like a ship plying stormy seas, the McChesney' love for each other and their child will prevail."]

A good movie with lots of empathy and comfort for the little girl who had been orphaned and in search of a family/  Greer Garson was terrific in this.  Walter Pidgeon was so good, also. My favorite kind of movie, probably because I felt lost and alone most of my childhood due to unkindness in a foster home.  Grew to get to know God as Father, which saved me. Finding out how much He loved me made the greatest difference in my life.
People sacrificing to show the love of God.

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has enjoyed several movies, often highlighting their emotional impact and storytelling. Many films received high ratings, suggesting satisfaction with plot depth and character relatability. The reviews reveal a preference for inspirational and thought-provoking narratives, as well as appreciation for nostalgic experiences from earlier years. Users expressed joy in discovering films that resonate with their life experiences, particularly those that emphasize kindness, love, and personal growth, contributing to a fulfilling viewing experience.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Several negative experiences are noted, primarily revolving around dissatisfaction with certain films. Users expressed extreme disappointment, with some describing movies as lacking depth or enjoyable content, leading them to abandon viewing. Reviews mention excessive violence or inappropriate themes that detracted from the overall experience, and some users directly labeled titles as unwatchable or "trash." Common themes include frustration with poor storytelling and a strong desire for movies that align more closely with their values and expectations.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's purchasing history reflects a mix of positive and negative experiences with films. While many movies garnered high ratings for their engaging and meaningful stories, there were notable instances of discontent related to problematic content or storytelling. Positive experiences highlight emotional resonance and nostalgia, while negative experiences focused on disappointment in poor film quality and inappropriate themes. Overall, the user seeks films that offer uplifting narratives and character depth, valuing personal connection to the stories told.

target_interaction.title: so much cursing
target_interaction.text: Did not care for this movie, what i saw of it.  Did not finish.  Constant foul language took away any possible good in the film.
